text: Antal Újváry (March 16, 1907 – 1967) was a Hungarian field handball player who competed in the 1936 Summer Olympics. He was part of the Hungarian field handball team, which finished fourth in the Olympic tournament. He played three matches as goalkeeper. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Hungarian male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Hungary Category:Field handball players at the 1936 Summer Olympics
title: Antal Újváry
